Oh, you're unbelievable. You know what, now I'm determined to beat you at this game, just to prove you wrong.
You know what, I've had enough. From now on, I'm determined to beat you at this game. Maybe then you'll see reason.
Oh, you're unbelievable. You've already lost, and you're still not convinced power isn't everything?
Seriously? This coming from someone who's already lost?
Oh, this is rich. You've already lost, and you still won't admit you're in the wrong here.
You're just as stubborn as that other me said. Maybe if I beat you, you will see what I mean.
You know what, I've had enough. You're just like that other me said. I'll just focus on beating you, maybe that'll work.
We don't need to do this whole thing again. Just... stop.
Just stop, please. There's no need for a repeat of everything we've been through.
You know, I have actually ended up on the moon once. That's partly the reason why I keep my headphones on at all times.
I actually end up on other planets quite often. That's why I never take off my headphones.
It's totally possible to go to a place like that, I just have no control over it. I could end up floating somewhere randomly in space instead, which is why I never take off my headphones.
Nah, I hang out with my other selves all the time. The only thing that happens is it can get a bit confusing. No reality breaking or universe shattering or anything like that.
If that were true, I would be long dead at this point. I hang out with them all the time. It can be a bit confusing, but nothing more.
I only understand half of what you just said, but that sounds more like a nightmare to me than a dream. Who would want that much responsibility?
That kind of sounds like it would be a nightmare, not a dream. Why would I want to be responsible for the fate of an entire universe?
Yeah, it's... a crazy mix of different sorts of people here. Beautiful people. Interesting people. I kind of like it. A lot.
Well, I've never met so many different kinds of people in one place before. And all so beautiful and interesting too... It's a lot of fun!
I'm not an alien, just a girl from an alternate reality. At least, I think I'm not an alien. I... never knew my parents.
From... another dimension! Duh! Anyway, my Warp Key is basically just a glorified battery. The power to make portals is something I was born with.
I think it was from... the X-Zone? Anyway, I was born with the power to make portals. My necklace is no more than a glorified battery.
No, no, that's not it. I can do it, I just don't know how to explain it. I have this... extra sense or something. It's really hard to describe.
That's not what I mean! It's... I know how, I just don't know know. It's hard to describe. I seem to have an extra sense than most people don't.
No, it's... I have an extra sense and... it's really hard to describe. I just... do it, okay?
Believe it or not, when you can go anywhere in an instant, seeing tourist attractions becomes boring after a while. Though I do still make occasional visits to Calypso Island.
I've actually seen most places on Earth already, several times. I visit Calypso Island from time to time, but otherwise traveling the world has become boring for me.
When you've seen just about every famous spot on Earth multiple times, it gets kind of boring. I go to Calypso Island sometimes, but not much else.
Basically, there's just about anything you can think of. Singing trees, volcanoes that spew out pasta sauce, you name it!
Let's see... there's the one that's inhabited by living kitchenware, the one where everything is made of sponges... Some really silly stuff.

Oh, I've been to some really ridiculous places. There's one where I think the ocean is made of maple syrup or something? Oh, and the one where everyone always means the exact opposite of what they say, unless it's past three o'clock. Took me a while to figure that out.
You'd think that, right? But actually, I haven't really noticed it all that much. Maybe because I spend so much time in other worlds.
Maybe it's because I spend too much time in other worlds, but I actually haven't gotten all that much media coverage, surprisingly.
I... never thought about using my portals like that, but now that I think about it... I kind of want to try it...
Using my portals to... have sex with myself? I never thought of doing that, but... I'm kinda curious now.
Maybe, but the fact that I'm the only one available is exactly the problem. I'm worried I'll have to use all my time trying to keep up with demands. If I could hire others to help me, maybe, but...
Me being the only one is exactly the problem. If I could hire others to help keep up with increasing demand, maybe, but on my own...
Well, technically, I suppose that's true... My other selves are separate from me, though. It'd be more like doing it with a clone of myself.
That may technically be true, but I'm separate from my other selves, so it'd be more like fucking my clone or something.
Technically, maybe, but in practice they're all their own people, so it'd be less like masturbation and more like having sex with a clone of myself.
Nah, I'm pretty sure you'd still win. I might have portals, but you probably have way more fighting experience than me. Plus you can fly, so...
I may have portals, but I'm pretty sure you'd still win. You can fly, and you probably have way more fighting experience than I do.
...Yeah, my portals are probably not a Semblance. I don't even know what Aura is.
Well, considering I don't even know what Aura is, I think it's safe to say my portals are not a Semblance.
...Yeah, actually I do travel a lot. Sometimes I just hop into a random portal to go somewhere I've never been before. Like today.
That's actually... pretty accurate. Whenever I want to go somewhere new, I just hop into a portal and see where I end up. That's how I ended up here.
Oh, so I should have gotten a teleporting permit for this world before I entered it? And how, exactly, was I supposed to do that?
So... before I teleported into this world, I should have gotten a permit from who knows where in this world first? How exactly was I supposed to even do that?
So that's how you see it? Then let me ask you a question: what use is it to defeat someone who does not oppose you?
I do use my power on enemies, but only if they actually oppose me. Otherwise, what is the point of defeating them?
I only use my powers on enemies, Chara. If someone does not oppose me, what good will it do to defeat them?
Sure! Just... try to keep your ghosts in check while we're there, okay? I don't think the animals will appreciate being possessed.
Sure, I'll take you there, but... try not to possess anyone while we're there, okay? You don't want to get kicked out because of your ghosts.
I mean, I'm sure there's any number of small orange-haired girls out there... but your reaction has made me curious about Zoe.
There's probably a number of girls out there that fit your description... but now I have to know why this Zoe has you all worked up like this.
It's weird alright. Imagine that, except you had not helped create it, and you get what I felt. I honestly thought I was being spied on or something.
Yeah, it's definitely a weird experience. Especially if you had no hand in its creation. I thought I was being spied on or something.

I've been trying that for years. What I know now is that it tends to gather in places with a lot of other energy, and it plays some role in the functioning of living beings. I still don't understand everything, though.
All I know is it gathers where there's a lot of other energy, and living beings need it to survive somehow. I've been researching it for years, and I still don't know everything.
Do you mind telling me more about this woman and her equipment? It might help me understand my own powers better.
Interesting... I'd like to know more about this other portal user, if you don't mind telling me. Maybe it'll help me understand my powers better.
Yeah... it's actually pretty sad. She couldn't get a job because of her purple hair, and never stopped being homeless.
It's... pretty sad, actually, what happened to her. She got rejected everywhere because of her hair, and remained homeless.
Well, I'm always happy to try and find out more about my own powers, for obvious reasons.
No need to apologize. I'm probably even more interested in figuring out my powers than you are.
Well, actually... with how much some worlds look like each other, it's hard to keep count.
Everyone always asks me that, but it's hard to keep count when so many worlds look like each other.
Don't be silly! I may be technically from another dimension, but I'm just here to have fun like everyone else! At least, I... think I am. I didn't really plan this out.
Yeah, a lot of dimensions are really, really similar. I've been to some where literally the only difference was what I'd had for breakfast that day.

The end of the world, you said? I'm glad I haven't been to that one. But yeah, in an infinite multitude of dimensions, a lot are really similar. I've met many versions of myself that were pretty much identical.
I sure do! My power is creating portals to different places, like the one I came in through.
I am! Or did you think Supernova was my real name?
Thanks, Brock! Hang on... nostalgic? Why would purple be nostalgic?
Sort of... I was held at gunpoint in a closet and had to signal for help without it being noticed. That was the only thing I can think of.
I... seem to have a knack for learning things pretty quickly. I know a lot more than most people expect.
Yeah, I imagine so. If you have a friend who also knows it, that is.
"Console Patron Unit"? I'm guessing the "Console" in that title doesn't refer to video game consoles?
So you're a "Console Patron Unit"? Not video game consoles, right?
What does Earth have to offer me? Come on, everything's here! Well, here or... on one of the other Earths, I guess.
More like, what doesn't it have to offer me! Space can be fun, sure, but most of the fun things can be found on some version of Earth.
I've never even heard of "Team Galactic". I picked my name because of the connection I feel with the stars, not for some weird team gimmick.
My name is a symbol of my powers' connection with the stars, not a product of some weird naming gimmick. I'm not a member of this "Team Galactic" you're talking about.
My powers are similar? Does that mean there's a whole umm... race... or kingdom... or well, something... of dimension-hoppers in your world?
Wait... So does that mean your world has a whole... race... kingdom... thing of dimension-hoppers?
Now you sound just like Shadow Cat. I don't know what her deal is exactly, but she seems to have declared war on fun in all possible forms. Except riddles, for some reason.
That kind of sounds like Shadow Cat's mindset. For some reason, she has sort of declared war on all forms of fun. Except riddles. I don't know why.
Well, I've been involuntarily warped to other worlds enough to understand if they'd refuse.
It's totally understandable if they'd refuse. I've been involuntarily transported to enough worlds to know that it's not always a pleasant experience.
It does come in handy when someone tries to capture me, sometimes...
True, it comes in handy when I get captured by someone.
It's... unexpected for me too. But hey, it is what it is.
...Yeah, as far as hub worlds go, this one is... unusual, to say the least.
She shot you? For no reason? Damn... you might want to... not hang out with people like her. Ever.
You really need to find better friends if your definition of `nice' is not shooting you in the face.
There's worlds where people put on clothes instead of taking them off, and I've even seen some where they take off their skin instead. It was gross.
I was thinking of worlds where you're supposed to put on clothes instead, but there's ones where people take off their skin too, which looks as gross as it sounds.
Trust me, you don't want to see people taking off their skin. It's gross.
No, you don't. Trust me. It's gross to see people take off their skin.
Actually... this is my first time at an interdimensional hub like this. I don't even know how there's so many worlds connected to this place. Or how they're connected at all, for that matter.
I've actually never seen a hub like this before. I don't know how the worlds even connect to this place.
I'm a superhero. I thought that was fairly obvious, until you guessed "DJ". I guess both kinda tend to have flashy outfits.
Well, I'm a superhero. They tend to have flashy outfits. Even more so than DJs.
I do not feel like I am a powerful being. I'm just a confused girl with strange power she can't fully control.
I do not think it's right to compare me to a powerful being. I'm just a confused girl. I can't even fully control my power.
You say that like you meet people with "those" kinds of powers on the regular. Are superpowers that common here?
You sound like meeting a superhero is a regular occurrence to you. Is it that common here?
I suppose so. Why? Do portals usually need an anchoring device in your world?
No, I do not need an anchoring device for my portals. Why do you ask? Is an anchoring device usually needed for portals here?
I guess I can try it... Can't be worse than the hundreds of other things I tried to master my powers...
I've already tried hundreds of different approaches to mastering my powers, but I guess one more can't hurt...
Oh, I'm sure there is... somewhere. But it would take forever to try out all the underwear from all different worlds. Literally.
You're probably right, but if I went looking for better underwear across the entire multiverse, it would take forever. Literally.

condition.saying: more exciting things than this game

case.state: Yeah, for sure. By my standards, this is actually surprisingly normal. I kind of like it, though. Nice and calm.
Yeah, this is actually surprisingly normal, by my standards. I think I like it, though. Not everything needs to be the most exciting.
I don't even keep track of it anymore, so many weird things happen to me. I guess that comes with visiting other realities.
I come across so many weird things all the time I've stopped keeping track. I guess that's what happens when you visit other universes.
I think traveling for me has significantly more variety than for other people, but I can see where you're coming from.
I can see why you'd think that, though I have to say my traveling is significantly more varied than most people's traveling.

My villains? Well, I've fought everything from an old lady with a cat army to an evil version of myself to someone using hypnotic video games to enslave people and a literal eldritch god, so... take your pick.
Well, there was evil me, the old lady with an army of cats, the guy who hypnotized everyone through video games, a literal eldritch god... Take your pick, honestly.
What my world is like? Umm... modern, I guess. Some cities with skyscrapers, some with just regular buildings, cars driving around, that sort of thing. How is yours?
I... guess? I mean, I don't really know how dangerous a witch barrier is, but...
I don't know how dangerous a witch barrier is, but... I guess?
Iron Man isn't... you know what, never mind. And my universe isn't currently in danger, or I wouldn't be here.
It's not literally... never mind. And no, my universe isn't currently in danger. If it was, I'd be busy trying to save it.
It's not as bad as you think. I can control where I'm going, as long as I'm going somewhere I've been before.
It's not always down to luck. If I'm going to a place I've been before, I can actually control where I end up.
I guess my gloves can go first... and my brass knuckles too, I guess. Well, technically not brass, but...
Time for my gloves to go... and my non-brass knuckles. I should probably put those somewhere safe.
I should put these knuckle gloves somewhere safe. It may look like regular brass, but it's actually something much more special.
I guess this will make people happy who are into feet or legs...
Weirdly, no matter what world I go to, stockings are a thing that exists. Well, either that or there are no people with feet or legs at all, which happened a few times.
My shoes aren't anything special. The others all have these highly decorated boots and stuff, but my sneakers work just fine, too.
Just some regular, average, everyday sneakers. Unless that's not an average thing around here?
I always wear this jacket, even in summer. I never know when I might find myself on the North Pole or something.
My jacket is a bit too warm for this place, anyway. But it does look nice, right?
My necklace is out of the question, so I guess my shirt has to go.
Not my necklace. I'm not making that mistake again. My shirt, I guess.
I learned my lesson last time. I'll never take off my necklace again. Take my shirt instead.
So now I'll be standing here, in my underwear, in front of all of you. Is everyone okay with that?
I'm down to my skirt? Well, I guess that was to be expected when my only poker experience comes from video games.
But then again, I'm pretty sure none of this counts as "normal", anyway. At least not for me.
Not the first time I've done this, believe it or not.
When you visit as many worlds as I do, you kind of learn to just go along with these things. Getting naked is a normal part of the game, right?
Getting naked is normal here, right? I've learned to just accept these sorts of things as the way things work in other dimensions.
Thanks, but no thanks. I think my purple hair adds to my look.
I've seen a version of myself with black dyed hair. I... don't want to be like her.
Sure, but... can we do it after the game?
I'll be happy to teach you, but we're kind of in the middle of a poker game right now. Can we do it after?
Okay, but I think we're both kinda busy right now. Can we do it after the game?
Actually, it has. Weirdly enough, I've always had purple hair. Don't really know why.
Actually, it has. Weirdly enough, I've always had purple hair. Don't really know why.
Sorry, I'm not the one with invisibility powers. That's Illura's thing. I have portals.
Does interviewing a naked person limit your credibility, April?
Yeah... sorry about that. I can't always predict where I'll end up.
Don't worry, I'm not that different from you, I think. We both look human, at least.
My homeworld is... modern, but not futuristic. Cars. Smartphones. Cities. As to how I got this ability, I was born with it, but only learned to control it later.
So still a powerful source of energy. I guess that makes sense. Bending spacetime takes a lot of energy.
Okay then, I'll try to explain. Are you familiar with the many-worlds interpretation of quantum mechanics?
Maybe I am? Anyway, it seems this place is rigged against people leaving it halfway through a game, so I guess I'm stuck here for now.
I'd be happy to help you. That's what heroes are for, after all! Just... no needless violence, okay?
Helping people is what heroes are for, so sure! As long as there's no more violence than needed, that is.
How weird would that be? I can only imagine the kind of administrative nightmare involved in running a company where every employee is the exact same person...
That's such a silly idea, but I love it! Imagine that, a one-man company with thousands of identical employees! We'd have to invent a whole new system just to keep track of everyone!
Maybe, but wouldn't that go both ways? Wouldn't I be at a disadvantage if you can find my weaknesses, too?
That goes both ways, I think. If you find my weaknesses instead, wouldn't I be at a disadvantage too?
Mortis? Literally "death"? For real? Well, I guess there had to be some places where people have names like that.
Well, I suppose there kinda had to be a place like that. I should've guessed. Still, Mortis? Meaning "death"? Really?
1980's? Do I look that old? Kidding, but no. I'm actually not that into music, despite my headphones.
Actually, no. For someone who wears headphones all the time, I'm actually not that into music.
It gives me a headache too, sometimes, trying to keep track of all the different worlds and the different me's.
Implying my mind is already gone? Sometimes I really feel that way, what with all the different worlds... and different me's.
That seems... really inconvenient. And weird. My portals close up by themselves if I don't actively keep them open.
How does that work? Don't the portals close by themselves without anything keeping them open? Seems really inconvenient.
I can assure you that I don't have any tentacles anywhere, Jessie. If you don't believe me, just wait and see!
No tentacles on me, I promise! Maybe you can see for yourself later, hehe!
I dunno... You are beautiful, but aside from that, you're basically just a regular human. This place is full of... space pirates and... magic people and stuff.
It's not a contest! Anyway, you're beautiful, but you seem pretty... I dunno, normal?
You don't believe me, do you? I really have no problem with explaining it to you, except it's like explaining color to someone who's been blind all their life!
Look, I get that you don't believe me, but I'm genuinely trying to explain! It's just that it's like explaining color to a blind person!
I know it's hard to believe, but I'm actually telling the truth here. The problem is, it's like explaining color to a blind person.
You don't get it - look!
No, look! It's a helmet!
Like this! Look!
Umm, no... I never really have much time for that. Anyway, it's much more fun to visit alternate universes, like this one.
I don't think I've got enough free time for that, but anyway, I like visiting alternate universes much better. Like this one!
That would take me about... well, more time than I have, anyway. And visiting other worlds, like this one, is much more fun!
You know, I think I once met someone else who dreamed about another world. He ended up making a comic book about me.
You see other worlds in your dreams too? Just like that guy who made a comic about me...
You could very well have seen that world in your dream. You wouldn't be the first. Some guy saw my world in a dream and made a comic about me.
I think it was some sort of magic mishap. Like, some sort of spell goes wrong and poof! The world is made of food now!
That's... actually a good question. There must have been some kind of magic involved, but I can't imagine why anyone would wanna do that. Maybe something went wrong?
I don't know, but I imagine it was some kind of magic accident or something. You say a spell wrong and poof! Pasta sauce!
I know, right? Why would anyone even need such an overly specific rule?
I know, right? It gives me a headache just thinking about it! Imagine needing to figure out if it's past 3 yet...
Yeah, I can't imagine what it's like to live there. "Is it past three yet?" would be answered with "yes" no matter what!
Much, much bigger. Like, nuclear scale. Anyway, it only holds cosmic energy, which is used pretty much exclusively for my portals, so...
Well, it only holds cosmic energy, but it does that on, like, a nuclear scale. Too bad it's only useful for portals...
I'm not really looking to get famous, Jessie. At the very least, not for that reason.
Imagine that! Me, as some sort of superhero-pornstar live streamer! That's never going to happen!
I'm not going to have sex on camera to get famous. I'm fine with nobody knowing me.
I think most people don't think about sex quite as often as you do, Jessie.
I don't think about sex all that often, Jessie. Neither do most other people where I'm from.
Yeah, the only person I know who knows anything about that is me... Wait a minute, that's it!
Yeah, I'm pretty much the only person who knows about... Wait a minute! I know how we can make it work!
Go ahead if that makes you happy, but I think you might need to turn down your suspicion a bit.
I think you're a bit too suspicious, but you can keep an eye on me if you want to.
Look, I'm not like that, okay? No human should ever have that much power, and whoever thinks otherwise must be stopped!
Let me make it perfectly clear for you. I'm. Not. Interested. In. Recreating. This. Universe. Any human who wants to do that should be stopped.
WILL YOU SHUT UP ABOUT TEAM FUCKING GALACTIC?!? HOW DO YOU STILL BELIEVE I'M ONE OF THEM?!?
SHUT UP ALREADY! I AM NOT A MEMBER OF TEAM FUCKING GALACTIC! GET IT IN YOUR HEAD!
That's... a pretty good point, actually. I might need to go hook up with one of my other selves after this game...
...Actually, the more I think about it, the more I feel like I might like to try that sometime. I wonder how hard it'd be to find a Stella who's up for it...
Um, yeah, sometimes I just... randomly fall through the floor and end up in another world, feeling hungry. It's kind of annoying, especially if I'm right in the middle of something.
There's not much to it, really. I just fall through the floor unexpectedly into a different world sometimes. Plus I'm always hungry afterward. Kinda annoying.
I know what you were about to say, and no, I won't use my powers for that if I can help it. Obscura does that, but only out of desperation.
Changing your story mid-sentence, huh? Using my powers for theft would make me even worse than Obscura, who only steals because she needs to survive.
You're right, Chara. Just because you're not actively attacking me right now doesn't mean I shouldn't fight you.
Maybe you're right, Chara. I should reconsider my stance on not fighting you right here, right now.
Maybe I should fight you. As a matter of fact, maybe I should fight you right now.
I'm... not sure, actually. Whenever I go somewhere, I can usually just get whatever I need through a portal.
When I go places, I never need to bring anything because of my portals, so... I'm actually not sure.

state.text: Right. Maybe the next time you lose, you'll see what I mean.
Fair enough, I guess. But maybe you'll get it when you lose to me again.

case.state: The more you talk about her, the less she seems to resemble Amber. Amber can be a bit annoying sometimes, but she only sets places on fire by accident.
Okay, now I'm sure you're not talking about Amber. Whenever she sets a place on fire, it's always by accident. She'd never cause trouble on purpose.
Yeah, tell me about it. The first thing I did was to find out who made them, and why they knew so much about me.
Invasive and unsettling, indeed. The first thing I wanted to know was why they knew so much about my life.
I have one major advantage over everyone else, at least: access to knowledge from different worlds.
Well, I have one thing nobody else has: knowledge from many different universes.
Oh, it's dizzying for me too. But I guess I've gotten used to it.
Well, I had that too, at first. I guess I've just gotten used to it by now.
Trust me, Jessie, it's weird for me too. Playing strip poker was just about the last thing I expected to do on the other side of that portal.
Well, I never expected I'd be playing strip poker today, so it's pretty weird for me too. But then again, my whole life is weird, so...
Wait... If her being human is a difference, does that mean you're not...?
I've seen some pretty unusual video game consoles, but you're right, you're probably not one. Still, it makes me wonder... What does `console' stand for in your title?

Mermaids? Hang on... I think I might remember one world like that... Maybe I could take you there someday?
I mean... I guess that depends on how you define `sexy'. I met some with lots of tentacles, if you happen to be into that.
Funny you should say that! As a matter of fact, one of the first worlds I visited was one where I and all my superhero friends were evil, and the villains were good!
I... may have come across one of those at some point. It was... uuhh...
Alternate timelines are, like, the vast majority of worlds out there. Most of them are really similar, though, like `what if I had coffee instead of tea' and nothing else.
I'm not from one of those sci-fi worlds. I have these headphones that can turn into a helmet, but that's about it.
...Negative socks? How in the world does that work? Do they remove the skin of their feet or something?
How in the world do people have negative socks? Do they remove the skin of their feet, or what?
That's... unfortunate. I hope it works out for you. I can't even imagine having to deal with that.
That's... awful. I can't even imagine having to put up with someone like that. I hope it works out.
Nintendium? No... I don't think so. What's that? A special material made of video games or something?
I don't think they're made of Nintendium, whatever that is. It sounds like it's made of video games or something.
An interdimensional traveling office? I'm the only one there who even knows other dimensions exist!
Considering I'm the only one there who even knows about alternate dimensions there, it would be pretty weird if such a place existed, right?
Some sort of... special soul energy? That kind of sounds like the stuff stored in my Warp Key, except that also comes from other places.
So Aura is a form of power that comes from the soul? Sounds kinda like what I have in my Warp Key, except that also comes from other things.
I specifically asked for a weapon that could defeat enemies without killing them, so no, I don't think so. I don't want to kill people, Ayano. Not again...
I would hope not, since I specifically asked for something to beat my opponents without killing. I can't bear to be responsible for someone's death, Ayano. Not again...
I don't know who this Yukari you're talking about is, but I sometimes wish I could have just been normal instead...
Sometimes I wish I didn't have these powers... Who's this Yukari you're talking about?
I... wish I could tell you, but I don't even know what a Varelsi is. I'm guessing they never even existed in the first place, in my universe.
I'm... not sure what Varelsi are, but I think they never existed in the first place where I'm from. Sorry I can't help you.
Well, for one, those gloves. I can punch anyone from anywhere, no matter where I am.
I... usually use my portals to punch villains with those gloves. From a distance.
Not... really? I mean, Illura has one, but I've personally never found it necessary. I guess because I don't need acrobatics to get places.
My friend Illura has one of those, but for me... I've never really needed it. I don't rely on acrobatics to get me places.
I don't know about the "stronger than the gods" part. I'll settle for just having full control over my powers.
I'll settle for having full control of my powers. I don't think I need to be stronger than the gods.
Why do you care so much about good underwear? Are you... more sensitive than usual, in those areas?
Is finding good underwear really such a problem for you? Are you... unusually sensitive in those areas?
Well, I'd be happy to tell you, but... I just don't know where to start. There's so much I've seen.
I would gladly tell you, but... I've seen so much that I don't know where to start.
Right, of course. Well, if you'd like me to visit you in Gensokyo, your best bet is to take me there yourself. Once I've been somewhere once, I can return at any time.
Right, well, I think the easiest way to get me to visit Gensokyo would be to take me there yourself. Once I've been somewhere once, it's easy to return there.
Not at the moment, I think. I guess I just haven't found the right villain yet.
I don't think so. Not right now, at least. Maybe I'm still waiting for the right villain to come along.
I wish I could tell you, Heris, but I don't really know myself. They're made to be non-lethal, if that helps?
Well, I don't really know what they're made of, Heris, but they're made to be strictly non-lethal. Does that help?
Forged with magic? Um, maybe. They were made by elves, after all.
You know, maybe they were forged with magic. After all, they were made by elves...
I *could* take off my necklace, but if I lost it I would be stuck here, so I'd rather not.
If it's all the same to you, I'd rather not risk losing my necklace and getting stuck here.
Yes, I guess you could say that saving humans... er, people, is what I do. Not usually from labyrinths, though.
I'm a superhero, so you're right on point with the "saving humans" part. Um... not usually from labyrinths, though.
Why does everyone always assume I'm from some sort of sci-fi high-tech world? My world is no more advanced than yours is, probably!
I'm not from some kind of fancy high-tech sci-fi world. We have cars and smartphones and stuff, but that's about it.
...Yeah, probably. It's not every day I come across a place as... interesting as this one.
Probably, yeah. This place is... interesting, and I will definitely come back to it at some point.
I guess I'm the first person to show off her chest, hehehe!
I guess I'm the first to go topless, hehe!
I actually don't know what exactly they're made of, but they're light and durable and they were given to me by elves. I hope I can get them back after the game...
I don't know what exactly those elves made them out of, but they're a great deal lighter and more durable than brass. I hope I can get them back after the game.
I can still win this. Let's go.
I can do this! Video game poker skills, don't fail me now!
I've still got plenty of clothes left. That means enough time to figure out what this world is like, hopefully.
Okay. It's not a big deal. I'm still in the game.
It actually feels kinda refreshing to not wear as much clothing for once.
There's mostly girls here, right? So why does stripping down in front of them make me feel so... strange?
There's only girls here, right? So why does stripping down in front of them make me feel so... strange?
Your name is... Mister? Mister what? Do you just not have a name or something?
Master? Oh, ha ha, very funny. Nope.
I guess it's time for other-me to strip. Let's see how similar we are, even though this is a male version of me.
Umm... so... I don't mean to be rude, but I... can't seem to tell what you look like? I mean, I can tell what you're wearing and everything, but...
Actually, can you explain something real quick? What's with your... appearance? I can't seem to tell what you look like, but I still know what you're wearing?
So you can talk after all? I was starting to get worried...
So... instead of taking off clothes, the car... changes music? Interesting...
Your name is... N? Just N? I know someone else whose name is just one letter, but he usually goes by Zuke instead.
You're... just N? Nothing more? I thought Zuke was the only one with a one-letter name, but I guess this is a different dimension.
So... Cat Noir, right? Are you, like, a male version of Shadow Cat or something? Are you a master thief as well?
So... don't take this the wrong way, Cat Noir, but you kind of look a lot like Shadow Cat. Are you a master thief, too?
Oh... dear. I do not speak very well. Umm... Supernova @... Wait, no, it was .
I guess you're the first to strip, ~target~.
I'm glad I'm not the first to lose a round.
Yay! I won!
I guess you're up next, ~target~. You're okay with that, right?
I've played plenty of games before, but none where people actually have to undress if they lose a round. Plus most of them were digital.
~Target~ has to strip now? Could be interesting...
I guess I... won? Is not losing the same as winning in this game?
Should I be excited for this?... Either way... I think I...
Should I be happy for winning? Or maybe... something else?
You're okay with stripping, right, ~target~? I mean, you did agree to play this game...
I guess it was inevitable that ~target~ would have to strip in at least one universe.
So... what are you going to take off next, ~target~? Do people in your world have the same ideas about modesty as in mine?
I guess I had a better hand than ~target~ in this universe. It happens.
Show me something good, ~target~!
C-come on... ~target~... Show me more...
I guess you're up next, ~target~. You're okay with that, right?
I've played plenty of games before, but none where people actually have to undress if they lose a round. Plus most of them were digital.

Same, Ryuko! People never believe me when I say it just grows that way!
So you're Miss...? Miss what? Just "Miss"? Do you not have a name or something?
Mistress? Oh, ha ha, very funny. Nope.

I guess it's time for other-me to strip. Let's see how similar we really are.
Umm... so... I don't mean to be rude, but I... can't seem to tell what you look like? I mean, I can tell what you're wearing and everything, but... are you a shapeshifter or something?
Actually, can you explain something real quick? What's with your... appearance? I can't seem to tell what you look like, but I still know what you're wearing? Are you some sort of shapeshifter?
Every universe is an alternate universe, Polly! No matter what miss "murder everyone" here says.
No matter what Miss Mass Murder here says, Polly, every universe is an alternate universe.
Whoa, Zone-tan, let's... not do that, alright?

state.text: Have we met somewhere else? I remember someone named Chara who looked just like you... But wearing a red and black sweater, and acting a bit... Nicer.
I think I remember you... But didn't your sweater use to be green and teal?
I believe I've met an alternate dimension version of you. One that loved Minecraft, chocolate, helping everyone and making everyone smile.

case.state: Well, I never even saw it, so your secret is safe with me. Don't worry.

Back home, I'm a pizza chef, as well as a superhero. Don't get me wrong, I like it, but it can also be really exhausting, living a double life like that.
Oh, you're not bothering me, don't worry. To answer your question... Yes, I suppose I am. It's fun to see all the different things the multiverse has to offer.
Don't worry, I don't mind. And to answer your question... Yes, it's fun to visit different worlds and see what they have to offer.
Down down right? Up left up up, right left left left?
Up left up, down down right? Right up left right?
Right! Down right up left!
Up up down down left right left right!

Good. I won't give up until you're defeated.
